content.raw:
Awesome! Should we list some issues here? For example:

* Instantiate teams to reduce duplicated code and make it easier to have proper joint directions

* Improve goals, either by making a polyline with a hole and fixing polyline texture coordinates, or by making it out of boxes.

* Add field texture

* Scale everything so players don't hit each other
content.html:
Awesome! Should we list some issues here? For example:

  • Instantiate teams to reduce duplicated code and make it easier to have proper joint directions

  • Improve goals, either by making a polyline with a hole and fixing polyline texture coordinates, or by making it out of boxes.

  • Add field texture

  • Scale everything so players don't hit each other
